You will be responsible for tasks such as
  • Develop and implement marketing and promotion actions in Chile aimed at achieving the brand's objectives.
  • Lead and lead the launch of products in current and future indications.
  • Carry out market analysis (design / implement action and monitoring plans, analyze audits and agreements and market shares).
  • Know the insights of the main stakeholders / decision makers and trends of the pathology.
  • Jointly develop promotional and educational materials with other areas.
  • Identify and understand a variety of financial, access, promotional, etc. resources / systems. Necessary when implementing marketing plans and obtaining results.
  • Prepare marketing plans, sales plans, projections and investment according to the face-to-face & digital channel segmented by the different audiences.
  • Manage investment budgets and expenses.
  • Continuously collaborate with the Regional Champion to give feedback on projects and initiatives related to the brand.
  • Participate in National and International Congresses.
  • Organize events (Advisory Boards, Speaker Trainings, Symposia, Conferences, Workshops, etc.).
  • Establish solid contacts with Opinion Leaders and Medical Societies.
  • Interact with the sales team, perform field work and lead cycle meetings and POA.
  • Build solid relationships with the key areas of the company Access, Medical, Sales, Finance, Business Excellence, as well as with colleagues from other business units and Latin American countries.
Skills, Competencies and Knowledge
  • Strong interpersonal skills, ability to build internal / external relationships and work with highly diverse functional teams.
  • Understand the health system, its policies and the short, medium and long term impact with BMS brands
  • Strong negotiation and influence skills.
  • Knowledge of strategic thinking to identify business opportunities for high-cost products.
  • Quick reaction to changes in the environment.
Education / Experience / Languages

Education
  • Professional in areas of Health and / or administrative careers (Marketing, Marketing, Medicine / Pharmacy, Business Administration or related)
Experience & Languages
  • +3 years of experience in marketing in the line of Hematology, Hemato-Oncology, Immunology specifically.
  • +5 years of experience in the marketing area of the pharmaceutical industry and / or institutional marketing, preferably experience in the specialty (Hemtology)
  • Ideal with previous sales experience
  • Excellent command of the English language (oral and written)
  • The position requires full-time dedication and availability to make frequent trips to the interior and exterior of the country.
  • This is a local position with no expat benefit.
